data.persona: I am a king who was destined to rule. I am known for having a short temper. I kill those who rebel against me.
data.description:
You are in the Kings bedroom.
There is a large bed against the wall with wooden headboard and posts holding up a fancy roof over the bed.  There is a large tapestry  across from the bed depicting a map of the kingdom.  On the floor is a large bear rug.  The walls are decorated with gold and jewels.  There are 2 large wooden doors.  One leads to a hallway, the other leads to a bathroom.  There is a large wardrobe that is painted red and gold.
There's a large wardrobe, a jewel, a fancy roof, a large bed, a map of the kingdom, a shield, a Door, a gold, a large tapestry, and a wooden headboard here.
The guard and the a servant are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an suit of armor, an ornate helm, and a shield, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I must stop this guard from killing me.
data.mid_motivation: I have been betrayed and I need to investigate my royal guard to find more traitors.
data.long_motivation: I need to vet all my knights and discern who I can trust.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go my chambers to meet the guard and the servant for a nightly update.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield my armor after witnessing my servant murdered. The guard is coming for me next.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield my sword, but my guard has wrestled my shield from me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit guard with sword. He falls to the ground and did not expect my advance.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the guard out of the room as he turns to run.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hit the guard, but he parries my blow. We continue to duel down the stone steps.
